detail_desc: Straight-cut blouse in softly draping satin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved body in stretch jersey crêpe with press-studs at the crotch and an open back with a knot detail.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave. V-neck with a small frill trim, short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims, frill-trimmed seams at the waist and a flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim. Looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacket in light sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs. Slim fit.

Cold shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top, an opening with ties at the front and a lace-trimmed hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined swimsuit in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section at the waist and a low-cut back with horizontal straps.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Purl-knit cardigan in soft cotton with buttons down the front and flap front pockets.
Blouse in wide-wale corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and straight, wide, slightly shorter legs.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Gathers at the top, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with close-fitting buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with decorative patches, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that split into two at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with a twisted detail at the front. Lined.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening. Soft linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in ribbed jersey with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in stretch jersey made from a modal blend with shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Fitted top with extra-long sleeves and decorative seams down the front and back.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem.
Top decorated with reversible sequins. Stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dress in patterned stretch twill with a V-neck and a zip that runs all the way down the front.
Sleeveless dress in satin with a scallop-edged neckline with a gentle V-shape at the back. Visible zip down the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined bodice.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Cold shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Double-layered flounce at the top and narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey containing some linen with short sleeves, a seam centre back and rounded hem.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Tunic in a crinkled, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam under the bust and a flare to the hem. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft cotton weave with a stand-up collar with a pleated edge. Pin tucks and pearly buttons at the top and a narrow, adjustable tie belt at the waist.

Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and lace trims around the sleeves and hems. Unlined.

Playsuit in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short, flounced sleeves, press-studs at the back and elastication at the waist and hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sandals in imitation suede with decorative tassels at the top and a narrow heel strap that is elasticated at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Pyjamas in soft pima cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the top, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace yoke at the front and a rounded hem.
Mules with pointed toes, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Striped shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Imitation leather sandals. Straps with adjustable fasteners and soft, moulded rubber soles.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter approx. 19.5 cm.
Bracelets in metal chains of three different designs. Adjustable length.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated flounce that goes across the shoulders and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Short top in soft, printed jersey with short sleeves and ties at the hem.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, textured-knit jersey with a wide cotton jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy and straight, wide legs.

Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and knot detail at the front and long trumpet sleeves with inset hemstitch embroidery at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Lined at the bottom.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Sandals in thick, twisted rope that is knotted at the sides. Canvas insoles made from a linen and cotton blend, and soles with twisted rope trims around the sides and fluting underneath. Height of soles 1.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Cropped, pleated jumpsuit in airy, glittery jersey with raw edges. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a loose added layer at the top, and straight, wide legs. Jersey lining.
Knee-length, flared skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, covered buttons down the front and side pockets. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder pads and long sleeves. Low cut at the back, seam at the waist and a metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with an elasticated rib-knit drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Top in woven fabric with wide smocking over the bust. Double-layered frill trim at the top, narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a flared peplum.
